content: Thanks for the helpful information. I think I'll need to crunch some more numbers and consider the trade-offs before deciding on whether to build a separate living space. Meanwhile, I'd like to explore other ways to increase the value of my property. Can you tell me more about the benefits of installing a patio and garden, like I recently did in my backyard? How can it enhance the overall appeal of my farmhouse, and are there any specific design elements I should consider to maximize its impact?
